plot: To prepare for the coming battle, Squad Zero brings Ichigo back to the Royal Palace. Kyoraku is appointed as the new Head Captain to lead the Thirteen Court Guard Squads.

The Gotei 13 is still recovering from their loses and in the meantime, the new head captain is being appointed who has taken some major decisions for the welfare of soul society. And we get a glimpse of what real fear looks like as the first kenpachi and the current kenpachi clashes.

The Gotei 13 is still recovering from their loses as in the meantime the new captain of Gotei 13 has been appointed who has taken some measures for the betterment of soul society. And also we get a glimpse of what real fear looks like as the First Kenpachi and the current kenpachi clashes.
